prompt_text: When any living room light is turned on between 9 PM and 11 PM, turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness, wait 10 seconds, then turn off the Office WLED
automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_lights_pulse_office_wled'
alias: Living Room Lights - Pulse Office WLED 20 Percent
description: "When any living room light turns on between 21:00 and 23:00, briefly pulse the Office WLED at 20% brightness, then turn it back off."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id:
      # Placeholder for living room lights; replace with actual living room light entity_ids
      # Example:
      # - light.living_room_main
      # - light.living_room_lamp
    to: 'on'
conditions:
  - condition: time
    after: '21:00:00'
    before: '23:00:00'
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_pulse
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 20
  - delay: '00:00:10'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_pulse

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'light' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living_room, living, office
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten
